data.trans_hint: Ông ta là một quý ông lớn tuổi hào hiệp.
data.en_hint: He is a chivalrous old gentleman.
data.content_game_1: He is a chivalrous old gentleman.
data.answer_en_hint: He is a chivalrous old gentleman.

data.trans_hint: Tôi hy vọng cô ấy sẽ đủ can đảm để lên tiếng chống lại sự bất công này.
data.en_hint: I hope she will be courageous enough to speak out against this injustice.
data.content_game_1: I hope she will be courageous enough to speak out against this injustice.
data.answer_en_hint: I hope she will be courageous enough to speak out against this injustice.

data.trans: Táo bạo, cả gan, liều lĩnh
data.trans_hint: Những nhà leo núi liều lĩnh cười cợt trước sự nguy hiểm.
data.en_hint: The daring climbers laugh at danger.
data.content_game_1: The daring climbers laugh at danger.
data.answer_en_hint: The daring climbers laugh at danger.

data.trans_hint: Nhìn bề ngoài, anh ta có vẻ là một người đàn ông gian dối.
data.en_hint: From his appearance, he does seem a deceitful man.
data.content_game_1: From his appearance, he does seem a deceitful man.
data.answer_en_hint: From his appearance, he does seem a deceitful man.

data.trans: Đáng mơ ước, đáng khao khát
data.trans_hint: Chiếc xe này rất đáng mơ ước.
data.content_game_1: This car is highly desirable.
data.answer_en_hint: This car is highly desirable.

data.trans: Khéo léo, tài tình, mưu trí
data.trans_hint: Anh ấy thật khéo léo - anh ấy có thể tạo ra những tác phẩm điêu khắc đáng chú ý nhất từ những vật liệu bình thường nhất..
data.en_hint: He is so ingenious - he can make the most remarkable sculptures from the most ordinary materials.
data.content_game_1: He is so ingenious - he can make the most remarkable sculptures from the most ordinary materials.
data.answer_en_hint: He is so ingenious - he can make the most remarkable sculptures from the most ordinary materials.

data.trans: Tinh nghịch, tinh quái, ranh mãnh, nghịch ngợm
data.trans_hint: Con trai của họ ồn ào và nghịch ngợm.
data.en_hint: Their sons are noisy and mischievous.
data.content_game_1: Their sons are noisy and mischievous.
data.answer_en_hint: Their sons are noisy and mischievous.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy là một người bạn trai đáng tin cậy để dựa dẫm.
data.en_hint: He is a trustworthy boyfriend to rely on.
data.content_game_1: He is a trustworthy boyfriend to rely on.
data.answer_en_hint: He is a trustworthy boyfriend to rely on.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy là một nghệ sĩ đa tài và cũng đang hoạt động như một doanh nhân.
data.en_hint: He's a versatile artist who has been also working as a businessman.
data.content_game_1: He's a versatile artist who has been also working as a businessman.
data.answer_en_hint: He's a versatile artist who has been also working as a businessman.

data.trans: Lịch thiệp, trang trọng (dùng cho đàn ông)
data.trans_hint: Tôi đã để cô ấy đứng một mình dưới mưa. "Cậu hành xử như vậy là không lịch thiệp rồi."
data.en_hint: I left her standing alone in the rain. "That wasn't very gallant of you."
data.content_game_1: I left her standing alone in the rain. "That wasn't very gallant of you."
data.answer_en_hint: I left her standing alone in the rain. "That wasn't very gallant of you."
